description: Chocolates in Russia find a unique way to express affection, humorously rivaling the warmth of vodka.
title: Warmth Over Vodka
n_1: In a cozy Russian cafe, Chocolate seeks a gift for Vodka.
n_2: Chocolate browses, pondering a perfect gesture.
n_3: With a confident smile, Chocolate finds the right words.
c1_3: I have something special for you.
n_4: Presenting a crafted gift, Chocolate's words melt the air.
c1_4: You warm my heart more than vodka!
